# ChronochRt

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

ChronochRt offers an easy way to draw chronological charts from tables. It aims to provide an environment suitable for persons new to R. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of ChronochRt from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("ChronochRt")
```
or you can install the development version with the newest bugfixes and features from gitlab with: 

```{r}
devtools::install_gitlab("roset/chronochrt")
```
